title: [Old Version] TurboTax Home & Business 2022 Tax Software, Federal and State Tax Return, [Amazon Exclusive] [PC/MAC Download]
description: Get your taxes done right with TurboTax 2022 TurboTax is tailored to your unique situation. It searches for hundreds of personal and small business deductions and credits, so you can be confident you’re getting every dollar you deserve. Recommended if you are self-employed, an independent contractor, freelancer, small business owner, sole proprietor, or have a home office or home-based business. Includes 5 Federal e-files and 1 State via download ($40 value). State e-file sold separately. Free U.S.-based product support (hours may vary). Boost your bottom line with industry-specific small business tax deductions Creates W-2s and 1099 tax forms for employees & contractors Up-to-date with the latest tax laws so you have the latest information  Get a head start by importing your info from last year's TurboTax return or other tax software Avoid mistakes by importing W-2s, investment & mortgage information from participating companies (may require free Intuit account) Save time by uploading a picture or PDF of your W-2 or 1099-NEC to import your data securely into the right forms Simplified asset depreciation and reporting Audit Risk Meter checks your return for audit triggers and shows your risk level Before you file, TurboTax runs thousands of checks to help identify missing deductions or credits
